name: One Very Determined Armadillo
description:
This is a game about very determined armadillo exploring an old castle made for #GitHubGameOff

Theme of the jam is "hybrid" this why the game mixes platforming and golf mechanics. Main character can't jump but he can roll up into a ball and launch himself in any direction.
Player can't jump in this game and has to throw the main character as you wold throw a ball in golf simulator. 

Controls

  • AD or arrows to move left and right
  • W to interact with an exit
  • Left click and drag on a character to aim and then release left mouse button to launch
  • Use WASD or arrows to navigate menus and Enter to select an option 
  • P  - exit to main menu
